patthana8.13:4.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.13:4.2: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.13:4.3: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo ca nanakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.13:5.1: Nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.13:6.1: Nakenaci viññeyyañca nanakenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
